channel.title: Since server help is full of noobs, I'll ask here
channel.description: So in the rs framework PK 2 play absconded making, we need player rendering, connection logging etc. I'm wondering how to add player rendering, all i need is a point in the right direction, i really need help. I'm looking at hyperion trying to figure it out, but yeah so if you can help or give advice on how to go about a frame work I'm all ears errrr eyes
